snippet: The department’s inspector general is investigating allegations that the hospital created a secret waiting list for patients intended to hide long wait times for appointments.
abstract: Top administrators at Veterans Affairs Dept health care system in Phoenix are placed on leave at request of department's inspector general, who is investigating allegations that hospital created secret waiting list for patients intended to hide long wait times for appointments.
lead_paragraph: The department’s inspector general is investigating allegations that the hospital created a secret waiting list for patients intended to hide long wait times for appointments.

headline.main: V.A. Hospital Officials in Phoenix Are Placed on Leave
